translations: n.撤退；退却；退休（等于 retirement）

sentences.sentence: The retiral teachers hygiene health service in university which is strengthened can reduce the expenditure of consulting public health services in university.
sentences.translation: 保健是一种综合性医疗服务体系，加强高校离退休教工卫生保健服务可以减轻高校门诊公费医疗支出的费用，适应离退休教工医疗保健的需要。
